designs.title: 模块化规范：避免指令诅咒
visual_elements: A pyramid divided into distinct levels, each representing a module
Each level has a description box
designs.key_quote: 模块化规范允许我们更精确地控制AI的行为。
designs.image_prompt: Technical blueprint-style infographic illustrating modular specifications as focused prompts. The background is a detailed engineering blueprint with grid lines and subtle technical annotations. A pyramid structure dominates the image, divided into three distinct levels. The top level, labeled '顶层模块: 高层目标' (Top Module: High-Level Goal) in a text box, represents the overall objective. The middle level, labeled '中层模块: 任务分解' (Middle Module: Task Breakdown), shows the breakdown of the goal into smaller tasks. The bottom level, labeled '底层模块: 具体指令' (Bottom Module: Specific Instructions), represents the specific instructions for each task. Connection lines link the modules to showcase the flow of information. The pyramid is colored in teal blue (#2F3376) with deep red accents highlighting key connections. The title '模块化规范：避免指令诅咒' (Modular Specifications: Avoiding the Curse of Instructions) is in dark red capital letters using a bold serif font like Crimson Pro at the top. Subtitle: '减少指令复杂度' (Reducing Instruction Complexity) in smaller font below the title. A key quote '模块化规范允许我们更精确地控制AI的行为。' (Modular specifications allow us to control AI behavior more precisely.) is placed at the bottom. A small watermark is located in the bottom right corner. All text, labels, titles, and annotations must be in Simplified Chinese (简体中文). Chinese characters must be clear, legible, and correctly rendered. Use a clean Chinese font like Noto Sans SC, Source Han Sans, or Microsoft YaHei. Detailed technical drawing style with a focus on clarity and precision. 4K resolution, ultra high quality, sharp details.

The 'Always Do' circle is teal blue (#2F3376), 'Ask First' is warm brown/gold, and 'Never Do' is deep red. The overlapping areas represent trade-offs and considerations between these constraints. The title '自检约束：AI的分层安全网' (Self-Checks and Constraints: A Tiered Safety Net for AI) is prominently displayed in dark red capital letters using a bold serif font like Crimson Pro at the top. Subtitle: '平衡自由与控制' (Balancing Freedom and Control) below the title. A key quote '分层约束系统能够有效地降低AI风险，在保证安全的前提下，赋予AI一定的自主性。' (Tiered constraint systems can effectively reduce AI risk, ensuring safety while granting AI a degree of autonomy.) is placed near the bottom. Subtitle: '通过反馈循环持续改进' (Continuous Improvement Through Feedback Loops) below the title. A key quote '将规范视为活文档，并通过测试反馈不断进行迭代和优化，可以确保规范的准确性和有效性。' (Treating specifications as living documents and continuously iterating and optimizing them through testing feedback can ensure their accuracy and effectiveness.) is placed near the bottom. Clear and concise instructions at each step

designs.image_prompt: Technical blueprint-style infographic illustrating AI discipline as the anancism of clear specifications. The background features a blueprint of a robot operating within a factory environment. A flowchart diagram guides the robot's actions. The flowchart starts with '输入: 清晰规范' (Input: Clear Specifications), leading to '处理: AI执行' (Process: AI Execution), and resulting in '输出: 预期结果' (Output: Expected Results). An alternative path, originating from '输入' is labeled '错误: 模糊指令' (Error: Vague Instructions), indicating the consequences of unclear inputs. Each step in the flowchart has clear and concise instructions. The flowchart is colored in teal blue (#2F3376) with deep red accents highlighting the error path. The title 'AI纪律：清晰规范的必然性' (AI Discipline: The Anancism of Clear Specifications) is prominently displayed in dark red capital letters using a bold serif font like Crimson Pro at the top. Subtitle: '将规范转化为可执行的产物' (Turning Specifications into Executable Artifacts) below the title. A key quote 'AI纪律的重要性在于，它提醒我们，AI并非万能的，需要清晰、明确的指令才能发挥其作用。' (The importance of AI discipline is that it reminds us that AI is not omnipotent and requires clear and explicit instructions to function effectively.) is placed near the bottom.
